text: Via 23.33 Mt 27.33, Mk 15.22, Jo 19.17-18 uavɨla fipɨ mu heŋ iahuavɨmi. Fipɨ agadɨ ibi Hali henaŋ fipɨ uavɨhadami. Iahuavɨla kɨlɨ cɨkaŋ hɨlihua lamalama agadɨ hɨvɨ Jisasɨ dɨ lama henaŋ hɨvɨ ifavɨci uci mɨŋaiaha lalɨlamavɨmi. Lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ hɨsɨŋ hulaŋ ahica agɨladɨ avi vivi kɨlɨ cɨkaŋ hɨtɨŋ hɨtɨŋ hɨlihua lamalama agɨladɨ hɨvɨ lamalama henaŋ hɨvɨ ifavɨci udaci mɨŋaiahaiaha lalɨlamavɨmi. Mu agadɨ Jisasɨ dɨ human sɨmi kɨlikɨli heŋ mɨŋaiaha lalɨlamavɨmi. Mu agadɨ human sakalɨ kɨlikɨli heŋ mɨŋaiaha lalɨlamavɨmi.
